events.name: “A Transformative Leap in Brain Imaging”: Innovative MRI System May Produce First Full Brain Connection Map
events.description: A new brain imaging system, Connectome 2.0, is far outperforming traditional MRIs in imaging microscopic brain structure disruptions.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Heinrich-Hoffmann-Straße, Niederrad - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the birthplace of modern brain imaging, where scientists made a groundbreaking discovery that could revolutionize medical research and understanding. Visit the Heinrich-Hoffmann-Straße, Niederrad, to learn about the history of MRI technology and witness the first full brain connection map.
